mapper.select: select r.* , o.orders_name as orders_name, o.orders_price as orders_price, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, m.member_id, m.member_name from reviews r inner join orders o on o.orders_id = r.orders_id inner join shop s on o.shop_id = s.shop_id inner join member m on o.member_id = m.member_id where m.member_id = #{member_id}
select reviews_id from reviews where orders_id = #{orders_id}
select reviews_img from reviews_images where reviews_id = #{reviews_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reviews ( reviews_rating, reviews_content, reviews_cdate, orders_id )values ( #{reviews_rating}, #{reviews_content}, sysdate(), #{orders_id} )
